string.text: ZokhanТs instinct: find the old notebook at the firefight site
Zokhan has told me that one of the bandits dropped an old notebook during battle. I should find it.
ZokhanТs instinct: check the coordinates
A set of coordinates for an area not far from here are mentioned in the notebook. Time to check it out.
ZokhanТs instinct: wait until night
The coordinates have led me to a note that holds the time and area of a meeting with a certain Skull. I have to wait until night and check everything there.
ZokhanТs instinct: go to the meeting with the unknown stalker
WhoeverТs behind this has appointed a meeting in the tunnel under the railroad embankment. I need to check that area. Perhaps IТll find out what the bandits were looking for.
ZokhanТs instinct: speak to Zokhan

I underestimated the gravity of the situation. Skull turned out wiser than I thought. He took a sum of money from me for some case and vanished into the dark. I need to warn Zokhan about these recent events.
ZokhanТs instinct: open the case
I need to find someone who can get this damn case open.
ZokhanТs instinct: speak to Zokhan
The case is open. I need to show its contents to Zokhan.
ZokhanТs instinct: collect ZokhanТs debts
I need to retrieve the money from Zokhan.
ZokhanТs instinct: examine the contents of the notebook
I found the notebook that Zokhan was talking about. I should read it to find out what else to do.
ZokhanТs instinct: read the note
When I arrived at the designated coordinates, I discovered a note. I should read it.
ZokhanТs instinct: return to Zokhan

I underestimated the gravity of the situation. The unknown stalker who organized the meeting turned out to be a bandit. He decided to take a sum of money from me; likely payment for a case that was in his possession. Good thing it didnТt work out for him. I need to discuss this situation with Zokhan.
ZokhanТs instinct: search the dead bandit

I underestimated the gravity of the situation. The unknown stalker who organized the meeting turned out to be a bandit. He decided to take a sum of money from me, but, fortunately, it didnТt work out for him. I need to check his body.
Strange case: wait until the case is opened
Van has assured me that heТll try to open the case, although heТll need some time to do it.
Strange case: visit Van
I received a message from Van not long ago: УBeast, IТve got some good news for you. When you have the time, come see me.Ф
Witch circle: jump into the anomaly
If ShilovТs theory is true, the anomaly should teleport me into a programmed area.
Witch circle: tell Shilov about recent events
Seems IТm alive, though I feel a strange sensation. I should go see Shilov.
Chain of events: figure out recent events
Chain of events: tell Shilov about recent events
Chain of events: answer the call
On the way to the farm, I saw the dead body of the guy in the tunnel. Everything is getting more incomprehensible and confusing.
Shit. My head is pounding. Seems IТm hearing a voice of some kind, and itТs calling me. I donТt know how, but I know where itТs calling me. I need to go there.
So thatТs where the voice came from: it was a controller. How the hell did it appear in the Cordon?Е
